markdownRemark.html: The club was found in 1917 and is situated in Granada. The facilities includes 6 tennis courts, 5 padel courts, a tennis school, landscaped gardens and terraces, multi-sports track for basketball, football, lockers and bathrooms, a sauna, gym and fitness center, a multifunction room for aerobic, zumba, a physiotherapy room for massages, a bar and restaurant, a hall for celebrations and a kindergarten for the little ones. There is also a television and games room on the premises.
